hero.title: Welcome to the MyMaestro Sample Application
hero.paragraph: Discover the power of Docusign Maestro API. Experiment with Maestro API calls in an interactive environment.

footer.title: DocuSign: it’s time to agree better
footer.paragraph: DocuSign helps organizations connect and automate how they prepare, sign, act on, and manage agreements.

login.acgDescription: This authentication type provides functionality of creating, triggering and managing workflows.
login.jwtDescription: This authentication type provides functionality of only triggering and managing workflows.

card1.title: 'Create a workflow'
card1.description: Create workflow definitions from the dropdown list below

card2.title: Trigger a workflow
card2.description: Get list of workflow definitions created and trigger workflows

card3.title: Manage a workflow
card3.description: Get list of workflow instances, update their status and cancel them

loader.title: Waiting for log in
loader.paragraph: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.

createWorkflow.mainDescription:
- Creation of 1-9 workflow
            - Creation of Offer Letter workflow
            - Creation of NDA workflow
createWorkflow.step1Description: Using the Envelopes:list API method, check that template is imported to the account, otherwise give an ability to download needed template.
createWorkflow.step2Description: Using the WorkflowManagement:create API method, create a workflow definition with all the data from the template.
createWorkflow.step3Description: Using the WorkflowManagement:publish API method, publish the created workflow definition to the account to make it visible and usable.

triggerWorkflow.mainDescription:
- Gets published workflow definitions from the account
        - Gets last run status of workflow definition used in this sample app
        - Triggers workflow definition
triggerWorkflow.step1Description: Using the WorkflowManagement:getWorkflowDefinitions API method, gets workflow definitions created on user account and filters last published definitions used in this app.
triggerWorkflow.step2Description: Using the WorkflowTrigger:triggerWorkflow API method, triggers chosen workflow definition with data parsed from the form

manageWorkflow.mainDescription:
- Gets triggered workflow instances of sample app workflow definitions
        - Gets status of workflow instances created using Trigger Workflow functionality
        - Cancels chosen workflow instance
manageWorkflow.step1Description: Using the WorkflowInstanceManagement:getWorkflowInstances API method, gets workflow instances triggered from workflow definition used for this sample app and filters only created in this user session4.
manageWorkflow.step2Description: Using the WorkflowInstanceManagement:getWorkflowInstance API method, gets the status of the chosen workflow instance.
manageWorkflow.step3Description: Using the WorkflowInstanceManagement:cancelWorkflowInstance API method, cancels the chosen workflow instance.

workflowTriggered.title: Workflow Triggered
workflowTriggered.description: To complete the workflow steps click the button below

publish.description: To publish the workflow, proceed with the button below
